question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the tables and chairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central. At your current location, if the tables and chairs in front of the Central ALL-STAR Cafe are not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view, and where is this object?  
choose:  
A. The tables and chairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not within my field of view, but there is a bus stop at the lower part of my field of view.  
B. The tables and chairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are already within my field of view.  
C. The tables and chairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not visible, but on the left side of my field of view is the main entrance of a high-rise building across the street.  
D. The tables and chairs in front of the Central ALL-STAR Cafe are not in my view, but the lake area in the park is in the lower right corner of my view.  
E. The tables and chairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not visible, but the facade of a low-rise building can be seen on the right side of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The tables and chairs in front of the Central ALL-STAR Cafe are not visible in the current field of view. However, on the left side of the field of view, there is a main entrance of a high-rise building across the street, which is the most relevant object based on the given options.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 4)]
Option: C
Reason: At the initial position (frames 00:00-00:04), the tables and chairs in front of the Central ALL-STAR Cafe are not visible within the field of view. The scene shows a wide city street with multiple buildings and trees. On the left side of the field of view, a very prominent and tall high-rise building is clearly visible across the street. The lower part of this building, where its main entrance would be, is within the view. This aligns perfectly with option C, which states that the tables and chairs are not visible, but the main entrance of a high-rise building across the street is on the left side of the field of view. Options A, D, and E describe objects not clearly present or less prominent than the high-rise building, and option B is incorrect as the target objects are not visible. The provided answer correctly identifies the high-rise building on the left as the most relevant object.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The tables and chairs in front of the Central ALL-STAR Cafe are not visible in the current field of view. However, on the left side of the field of view, there is a main entrance of a high-rise building across the street, which is the most relevant object based on the given options.
